data.name: PleaseFill
data.value: Please fill out the information in the steps below and within a few minutes you will have a private and dedicated full trial of the IBN up and running within our hosting center. You can use this private trial to evaluate the IBN in any way you see fit and are under no obligation to purchase at the end of your trial.

data.name: PleaseEnter
data.value: Please enter information so we can start setting up your private IBN trial

data.name: ThisShould
data.value: This should be a short description that will appear at the top of your IBN Web Portal. i.e. "Secure Collaboration Portal".

data.name: SpecifyTheSize
data.value: Specify the size of the group that will be using the IBN for the Trial.

data.name: EnterABrief
data.value: Enter a brief description of your IBN, to appear on the login page. You can always change this later or leave blank if you wish.

data.name: EnterTheWeb
data.value: Enter the web address that you would like to use to access your trial IBN. For example http://mycompany.mediachase.net

data.name: PleaseEnter2
data.value: Please enter your contact information so that you can be granted authority to administer your IBN trial portal.

data.name: PleaseSelectLogin
data.value: Please select a login name and password that will be used by you.

data.name: ReadTerms
data.value: Please read the terms of service and if you agree, check the box and click "Create Trial Site" Button below

data.name: Assist
data.value:
Trial Assistance and Support

E-Mail Support: If you have any questions or issues during your trial, you can e-mail us at trial@mediachase.com.

Online IM Support: If you are evaluating the secure communication/IM aspects of the IBN, you can get answers from our
global support team instantly.

Support Forums: Please visit http://www.mediachase.com/community

Telephone: You can also contact us at U.S. +1 -323-988-1071.

Additional Information: Please visit http://www.mediachase.com for more information.

data.name: TrialRejectedReasons
data.value: Trial site creation rejected due following reasons:

data.name: DomainExists
data.value: Domain already exists. Please select other domain name.

data.name: OneStep
data.value: Only One More Step to Go...

data.name: Created
data.value: You are Trial Site is Successfully Created

data.name: UserRegistered
data.value: User with this E-mail address already registered. Please select other E-mail address.

data.name: Security
data.value: To ensure the security and privacy of your IBN trial, you will shortly receive an e-mail with a special activation link that only you can see. When you receive this e-mail, simply follow the quick instructions to activate and begin your trial.

data.name: Congratulations
data.value: Congratulations. Now you can go to http://{0}.{1} and start using you trial site.

data.name: strMetaDescr
data.value: IBN Trial Sign Up. No Obligation.

data.name: strAttention
data.value: Pay attention: if we cannot verify the contact information you entered, the portal will be deactivated.

data.name: strSendMe
data.value: I want to receive Mediachase special proposals

data.name: strCallMe
data.value: Call me back and give more detailed information regarding the product and its features
